subject: Re: [LH] Kate is everywhere
body:
On 2 Jun 2007 00:20:27 -0400, nessus@mit.edu (Spielas Alan) wrote:

>d~  wrote:
>
>> http://www.woot.com/
>> I hid my yo-yo in the garden
>
>You better beware of that Woot -- it's as addictive as Kate Bush!
>
>|>oug

Not as quite.

I don't woot that often, so I was shocked when the first time I'd
checked in MONTHS, Kate was present.  AND I had just finished reading
_they call me naughty lola_  AND!! my BIL and I just had a
conversation re: Gaffa/gaffer's tape.

My KT cup runneth over.

Also, I've been trying to compose a frightfully overwhelming post on
the most misunderstood songs on Ae.

Unfortunately I lack the concentration necessary these days, but have
nor fear - - I will manage someday.

d~

www.fibermonkey.blogspot.com

* FYI: I don't check mail at this @ddy.

Oh, and... "fuck the turkeybutts!"
